lst = [5, 7, 20, 11, 10, 2, 1, 5, 17, 0]
for i in range(1, len(lst)):
    j = i-1
    while (j >= 0) and (lst[j] > lst[j+1]):
        lst[j], lst[j+1] = lst[j+1], lst[j]
        j -= 1
print(lst)

def print_matrix(m):
    for i in m:
        print(i)
matrix = [[0.5,   0,   0,   0,   0],
          [  1, 0.5,   0,   0,   0],
          [  1,   1, 0.5,   0,   0],
          [  1,   1,   1, 0.5,   0],
          [  1,   1,   1,   1, 0.5]]
matrix_t = list(zip(*matrix))
print_matrix(matrix_t)
